info.title: Contacts App
info.description: Manage your contacts with ease - a REST API for creating, updating, and deleting contacts

get.description: Get a page-by-page paginated list of contacts with filtering and sorting options

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order (1 for ascending, -1 for descending)

message.example: Successfully found contacts! Page 1 of 5, shown 10 pcs of 50 contacts
Invalid request data: page and perPage must be positive integers

data.message: Invalid request data: page and perPage must be positive integers

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

unauthorized.summary: Access token is expired, invalid or missing

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

post.description: Add a new contact to the database, optionally uploading a photo

message.example: Invalid request data: phoneNumber must be a valid phone number (e.g., +380501234567)

data.message: Invalid request data: phoneNumber must be a valid phone number (e.g., +380501234567)

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

unauthorized.summary: Access token is expired, invalid or missing

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

get.description: Get detailed information about a contact by its unique identifier (ID)

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of the contact to get

message.example: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

data.message: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

unauthorized.summary: Access token is expired, invalid or missing

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

message.example: Contact not found or you do not have permission

data.message: Contact not found or you do not have permission

put.summary: Replace or create contact by ID
put.description: Replace an existing contact by its unique identifier (ID) or create a new one if it does not exist, optionally uploading a new photo

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of the contact to replace

201.description: Contact created successfully because it did not exist

message.example: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

data.message: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

message.example: Contact not found or you do not have permission

data.message: Contact not found or you do not have permission

patch.description: Partially update an existing contact by its unique identifier (ID), optionally uploading a new photo

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: ID of the contact to update

message.example: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

data.message: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

message.example: Contact not found or you do not have permission

data.message: Contact not found or you do not have permission

delete.description: Remove a contact from the database by its unique identifier (ID)

message.example: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

data.message: Invalid request data: contactId must be a valid ObjectId

message.example: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

data.message: Access token is expired, invalid or not provided

message.example: Contact not found or you do not have permission

data.message: Contact not found or you do not have permission

post.description: Register a new user with email, password, and name

message.example: Invalid request data: email must be a valid email address, password must be at least 8 characters long, name must be at least 3 characters long

data.message: Invalid request data: email must be a valid email address, password must be at least 8 characters long, name must be at least 3 characters long

post.description: Login a user with email and password, sets refreshToken and sessionId cookies

schema.example: refreshToken=randomRefreshToken123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT; sessionId=randomSessionId123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT

message.example: Invalid request data: email and password are required

data.message: Invalid request data: email and password are required
Email or password is wrong

post.description: Logout a user by clearing session cookies

schema.example: refreshToken=; HttpOnly; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; sessionId=; HttpOnly; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT

data.message: Invalid session ID

message.example: Session not found or invalid token

data.message: Session not found or invalid token

post.description: Refresh user session using refreshToken and sessionId cookies, updates cookies

schema.example: refreshToken=newRefreshToken123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT; sessionId=newSessionId123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT

message.example: Session not found or invalid token

data.message: Session not found or invalid token

post.description: Send a password reset email to the user

message.example: Reset password email has been successfully sent!

data.description: Empty object as no additional data is returned

message.example: Invalid request data: email is required and must be a valid email address

data.message: Invalid request data: email is required and must be a valid email address
User not found

post.description: Reset user password using a token from the reset email

data.description: Empty object as no additional data is returned

message.example: Invalid request data: password and token are required

data.message: Invalid request data: password and token are required

message.example: Token is expired, invalid or not provided

data.message: Token is expired, invalid or not provided
User not found

get.description: Get the URL for Google OAuth login

post.summary: Login or register with Google OAuth
post.description: Login or register a user using Google OAuth code, sets refreshToken and sessionId cookies

200.description: User logged in via Google OAuth successfully

message.example: Successfully logged in via Google OAuth!

schema.example: refreshToken=googleRefreshToken123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT; sessionId=googleSessionId123; HttpOnly; Expires=Wed, 02 May 2025 00:00:00 GMT

message.example: Invalid request data: code is required

data.message: Invalid request data: code is required
No payload received

isFavourite.description: Indicates if the contact is a favorite

userId.description: ID of the user who owns the contact

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was last updated

message.example: This email is already in use
enum: This email is already in use

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server, please try again later
enum: An unexpected error occurred on the server, please try again later
